 Magnus stepped into the hologram machine. No matter where she is or doing 
the image of Magnus's face would appear in her optics.. "Kit Kat. Please 
bring your men and troops to the new base. But I need you to bring the ships 
core. Destructor's base has already been stripped of all defences. Let us 
start the council's reign. The best ship and the best crew. Me destructor 
datatron and the whole crew await the arrival of the preds and the rest. So 
we may begin the end of the alliance.
